016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator;
017
018import static de.cuioss.tools.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
019import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
020
021import javax.faces.application.Application;
022import javax.faces.component.FacesComponent;
023import javax.faces.component.UIComponent;
024import javax.faces.component.UIForm;
025import javax.faces.component.UIInput;
026import javax.faces.component.UIOutput;
027import javax.faces.component.UISelectBoolean;
028import javax.faces.component.UISelectOne;
029import javax.faces.component.UIViewRoot;
030import javax.faces.component.behavior.ClientBehavior;
031import javax.faces.component.behavior.FacesBehavior;
032import javax.faces.component.html.HtmlCommandButton;
033import javax.faces.component.html.HtmlForm;
034import javax.faces.component.html.HtmlInputText;
035import javax.faces.component.html.HtmlOutputText;
036import javax.faces.component.html.HtmlSelectBooleanCheckbox;
037import javax.faces.component.html.HtmlSelectOneRadio;
038import javax.faces.context.FacesContext;
039import javax.faces.convert.Converter;
040import javax.faces.convert.FacesConverter;
041import javax.faces.render.FacesRenderer;
042import javax.faces.render.Renderer;
043import javax.faces.validator.FacesValidator;
044import javax.faces.validator.Validator;
045
046import de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks.CuiMockComponent;
047import de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks.CuiMockRenderer;
048import de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks.CuiMockUIViewRoot;
049import de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks.CuiMockViewHandler;
050import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.impl.DefaultInstantiator;
051import lombok.NonNull;
052import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
053
054/**
055 * Helper class acting as runtime-registry for {@link UIComponent},
056 * {@link Converter}, {@link Validator} and {@link Renderer}
057 *
058 * @author Oliver Wolff
059 */
060@RequiredArgsConstructor
061public class ComponentConfigDecorator {
062
063    static final String FORM_RENDERER_ID = "javax.faces.Form";
064    static final String TEXT_RENDERER_ID = "javax.faces.Text";
065    static final String SELECTBOOLEAN_RENDERER_ID = "javax.faces.SelectBoolean";
066    static final String SELECTONE_RENDERER_ID = "javax.faces.SelectOne";
067    private static final String BEHAVIOR_CLASS_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "behaviorClass must not be null";
068    private static final String BEHAVIOR_ID_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "behaviorId must not be null";
069    private static final String RENDERER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "renderer must not be null";
070    private static final String RENDERER_TYPE_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "rendererType must not be null";
071    private static final String FAMILY_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "family must not be null";
072    private static final String VALIDATOR_ID_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "validatorId must not be null";
073    private static final String CONVERTER_ID_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "converterId must not be null";
074    private static final String TARGET_CLASS_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "targetClass  must not be null";
075    private static final String VALIDATOR_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "validator must not be null";
076    private static final String COMPONENT_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "component must not be null";
077    private static final String COMPONENT_TYPE_NOT_BE_NULL = "component must not be null";
078    private static final String CONVERTER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "converter  must not be null";
079
080    @NonNull
081    private final Application application;
082
083    @NonNull
084    private final FacesContext facesContext;
085
086    /**
087     * Adds add {@link Validator} to the given id.
088     *
089     * @param validatorId the id the {@link Validator} should be registered with,
090     *                    must not be null
091     * @param validator   the actual {@link Validator} class, must not be null.
092     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
093     *         fluent-api style usage
094     */
095    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerValidator(final String validatorId,
096            final Class<? extends Validator> validator) {
097        requireNonNull(validator, VALIDATOR_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
098        requireNonNull(validatorId, VALIDATOR_ID_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
099        application.addValidator(validatorId, validator.getName());
100        return this;
101    }
102
103    /**
104     * Adds add {@link Validator} the needed validatorId is retrieved from
105     * {@link FacesValidator}.
106     *
107     * @param validator the actual {@link Validator} class, must not be null. In
108     *                  order to work the {@link Validator} must provide the
109     *                  {@link FacesValidator} annotation in order to identify the
110     *                  the needed validatorId
111     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
112     *         fluent-api style usage
113     */
114    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerValidator(final Class<? extends Validator> validator) {
115        requireNonNull(validator, VALIDATOR_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
116        checkArgument(validator.isAnnotationPresent(FacesValidator.class),
117                "In order to work this method needs a validator annotated with 'javax.faces.validator.FacesValidator', validatorClass:"
118                        + validator.getName());
119        return registerValidator(validator.getAnnotation(FacesValidator.class).value(), validator);
120    }
121
122    /**
123     * Register a {@link Converter} for a given target class.
124     *
125     * @param converter   to be registered , must not be null
126     * @param targetClass must not be null
127     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
128     *         fluent-api style usage
129     */
130    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerConverter(final Class<? extends Converter> converter,
131            final Class<?> targetClass) {
132        requireNonNull(targetClass, TARGET_CLASS_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
133        requireNonNull(converter, CONVERTER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
134        application.addConverter(targetClass, converter.getName());
135        return this;
136    }
137
138    /**
139     * Register a {@link Converter} for a given target class.
140     *
141     * @param converter to be registered , must not be null and must provide a
142     *                  {@link FacesConverter} annotation for deriving targetType or
143     *                  converter.id
144     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
145     *         fluent-api style usage
146     */
147    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerConverter(final Class<? extends Converter> converter) {
148        requireNonNull(converter, CONVERTER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
149        checkArgument(converter.isAnnotationPresent(FacesConverter.class),
150                "In order to work this method needs a converter annotated with 'javax.faces.convert.FacesConverter', converterClass:"
151                        + converter.getName());
152        final var facesConverter = converter.getAnnotation(FacesConverter.class);
153        if (!Object.class.equals(facesConverter.forClass())) {
154            registerConverter(converter, facesConverter.forClass());
155        }
156        if (!facesConverter.value().isEmpty()) {
157            registerConverter(converter, facesConverter.value());
158        }
159        return this;
160    }
161
162    /**
163     * Register a {@link Converter} to a given converterId.
164     *
165     * @param converter   to be registered , must not be null
166     * @param converterId must not be null
167     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
168     *         fluent-api style usage
169     */
170    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerConverter(final Class<? extends Converter> converter,
171            final String converterId) {
172        requireNonNull(converterId, CONVERTER_ID_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
173        requireNonNull(converter, CONVERTER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
174        application.addConverter(converterId, converter.getName());
175        return this;
176    }
177
178    /**
179     * Registers a {@link UIComponent}
180     *
181     * @param componentType identifying the component, must not be null
182     * @param component     the actual component, must not be null
183     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
184     *         fluent-api style usage
185     */
186    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerUIComponent(final String componentType,
187            final Class<? extends UIComponent> component) {
188        requireNonNull(componentType, COMPONENT_TYPE_NOT_BE_NULL);
189        requireNonNull(component, COMPONENT_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
190        application.addComponent(componentType, component.getName());
191        return this;
192    }
193
194    /**
195     * Registers a {@link UIComponent}
196     *
197     * @param component the actual component, must not be null must provide the
198     *                  {@link FacesComponent} annotation to derive the componentId
199     *                  to be registered to.
200     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
201     *         fluent-api style usage
202     */
203    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerUIComponent(final Class<? extends UIComponent> component) {
204        requireNonNull(component, COMPONENT_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
205        checkArgument(component.isAnnotationPresent(FacesComponent.class),
206                "In order to work this method needs a UIComponent annotated with 'javax.faces.component.FacesComponent', component:"
207                        + component.getName());
208        return registerUIComponent(component.getAnnotation(FacesComponent.class).value(), component);
209    }
210
211    /**
212     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockComponent} with a
213     * {@link CuiMockRenderer}.
214     *
215     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
216     *         fluent-api style usage
217     */
218    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerCuiMockComponentWithRenderer() {
219        registerUIComponent(CuiMockComponent.class);
220        registerMockRenderer(CuiMockComponent.FAMILY, CuiMockComponent.RENDERER_TYPE);
221        return this;
222    }
223
224    /**
225     * Registers a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for the given attributes.
226     *
227     * @param family       identifying the component-family the renderer is related
228     *                     to, must not be null
229     * @param rendererType identifying the type of the renderer is related to, must
230     *                     not be null
231     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
232     *         fluent-api style usage
233     */
234    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRenderer(final String family, final String rendererType) {
235        requireNonNull(family, FAMILY_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
236        requireNonNull(rendererType, RENDERER_TYPE_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
237        facesContext.getRenderKit().addRenderer(family, rendererType, new CuiMockRenderer());
238        return this;
239    }
240
241    /**
242     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for
243     * {@link HtmlOutputText}.
244     *
245     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
246     *         fluent-api style usage
247     */
248    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRendererForHtmlOutputText() {
249        registerMockRenderer(UIOutput.COMPONENT_FAMILY, TEXT_RENDERER_ID);
250        return this;
251    }
252
253    /**
254     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for
255     * {@link HtmlSelectBooleanCheckbox}.
256     *
257     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
258     *         fluent-api style usage
259     */
260    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRendererForHtmlSelectBooleanCheckbox() {
261        registerMockRenderer(UISelectBoolean.COMPONENT_FAMILY, SELECTBOOLEAN_RENDERER_ID);
262        return this;
263    }
264
265    /**
266     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for
267     * {@link HtmlSelectOneRadio}.
268     *
269     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
270     *         fluent-api style usage
271     */
272    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRendererForHtmlSelectOneRadio() {
273        registerMockRenderer(UISelectOne.COMPONENT_FAMILY, SELECTONE_RENDERER_ID);
274        return this;
275    }
276
277    /**
278     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for
279     * {@link HtmlInputText}.
280     *
281     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
282     *         fluent-api style usage
283     */
284    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRendererForHtmlInputText() {
285        registerMockRenderer(UIInput.COMPONENT_FAMILY, TEXT_RENDERER_ID);
286        return this;
287    }
288
289    /**
290     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for {@link HtmlForm}.
291     *
292     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
293     *         fluent-api style usage
294     */
295    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRendererForHtmlForm() {
296        registerMockRenderer(UIForm.COMPONENT_FAMILY, FORM_RENDERER_ID);
297        return this;
298    }
299
300    /**
301     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for
302     * {@link HtmlCommandButton}.
303     *
304     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
305     *         fluent-api style usage
306     */
307    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRendererForCommandButton() {
308        facesContext.getRenderKit().addRenderer("javax.faces.Command", "javax.faces.Button",
309                new CuiMockRenderer("CommandButton"));
310        return this;
311    }
312
313    /**
314     * Registers a {@link Renderer}
315     *
316     * @param family       identifying the component-family the renderer is related
317     *                     to, must not be null
318     * @param rendererType identifying the type of the renderer is related to, must
319     *                     not be null
320     * @param renderer     the actual renderer to be registered, must not be null
321     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
322     *         fluent-api style usage
323     */
324    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerRenderer(final String family, final String rendererType,
325            final Renderer renderer) {
326        requireNonNull(family, FAMILY_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
327        requireNonNull(rendererType, RENDERER_TYPE_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
328        requireNonNull(renderer, RENDERER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
329        facesContext.getRenderKit().addRenderer(family, rendererType, renderer);
330        return this;
331    }
332
333    /**
334     * Registers a {@link Renderer} The family and rendererType will be derived by
335     * the mandatory {@link FacesRenderer} annotation
336     *
337     * @param renderer the actual renderer to be registered, must not be null, must
338     *                 provide {@link FacesRenderer} annotation and a no arg public
339     *                 constructor.
340     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
341     *         fluent-api style usage
342     */
343    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerRenderer(final Class<? extends Renderer> renderer) {
344        requireNonNull(renderer, RENDERER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
345        checkArgument(renderer.isAnnotationPresent(FacesRenderer.class),
346                "In order to work this method needs a Renderer annotated with 'javax.faces.render.FacesRenderer', renderer:"
347                        + renderer.getName());
348        final Renderer instance;
349        instance = new DefaultInstantiator<>(renderer).newInstance();
350        final var config = renderer.getAnnotation(FacesRenderer.class);
351        return registerRenderer(config.componentFamily(), config.rendererType(), instance);
352    }
353
354    /**
355     * Register a {@link ClientBehavior} for a given behaviorId
356     *
357     * @param behaviorId    the id the {@link ClientBehavior} should be registered
358     *                      with, must not be null
359     * @param behaviorClass the actual type of the {@link ClientBehavior} must not
360     *                      be null
361     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
362     *         fluent-api style usage
363     */
364    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerBehavior(final String behaviorId,
365            final Class<? extends ClientBehavior> behaviorClass) {
366        requireNonNull(behaviorId, BEHAVIOR_ID_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
367        requireNonNull(behaviorClass, BEHAVIOR_CLASS_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
368        application.addBehavior(behaviorId, behaviorClass.getName());
369        return this;
370    }
371
372    /**
373     * Register a {@link ClientBehavior}. The behaviorId will be extracted by the
374     * mandatory {@link FacesBehavior} annotation
375     *
376     * @param behaviorClass the actual type of the {@link ClientBehavior} must not
377     *                      be null and provide the {@link FacesBehavior} annotation
378     *                      in order to extract the correct behaviorId
379     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
380     *         fluent-api style usage
381     */
382    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerBehavior(final Class<? extends ClientBehavior> behaviorClass) {
383        requireNonNull(behaviorClass, BEHAVIOR_CLASS_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
384        checkArgument(behaviorClass.isAnnotationPresent(FacesBehavior.class),
385                "In order to work this method needs a ClientBehavior annotated with 'javax.faces.component.behavior.FacesBehavior', behaviorClass:"
386                        + behaviorClass.getName());
387        return registerBehavior(behaviorClass.getAnnotation(FacesBehavior.class).value(), behaviorClass);
388    }
389
390    /**
391     * Register a composite component to be rendered.
392     *
393     * @param libraryName the library name like
394     *                    "http://xmlns.jcp.org/jsf/composite/" or "
395     * @param tagName     the tag name
396     * @param uiComponent the component that should be returned as mock /
397     *                    placeholder for the composite component
398     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
399     *         fluent-api style usage
400     */
401    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerCompositeComponent(final String libraryName, final String tagName,
402            final UIComponent uiComponent) {
403        if (!(application.getViewHandler() instanceof CuiMockViewHandler)) {
404            application.setViewHandler(new CuiMockViewHandler());
405        }
406        ((CuiMockViewHandler) application.getViewHandler()).registerCompositeComponent(libraryName, tagName,
407                uiComponent);
408        return this;
409    }
410
411    /**
412     * Add a component to the view root to be found when searching via
413     * {@link UIViewRoot#findComponent(String)}.
414     *
415     * @param expr      the expression the component should be found with
416     * @param component the component
417     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
418     *         fluent-api style usage
419     */
420    public ComponentConfigDecorator addUiComponent(String expr, UIComponent component) {
421        if (!(facesContext.getViewRoot() instanceof CuiMockUIViewRoot)) {
422            facesContext.setViewRoot(new CuiMockUIViewRoot());
423        }
424        ((CuiMockUIViewRoot) facesContext.getViewRoot()).addUiComponent(expr, component);
425        return this;
426    }
427
428}
